body:
I just saw you mentioned in [this weird iceberg](https://ruqqus.com/+RuqqusCirclejerk/post/4kuh/ruqqus-iceberg-chart) and yours is 1 of about 5 usernames on Ruqqus I recognise so I thought I'd check and see why you've gained notoriety.

Stop being a drama queen, we like your posts.

Anyway it's No-Fun-November so I shouldn't even be here. I thought a dopamine detox would make sleeping easier but alas, it's 5:45am.

Keep your c̶h̶i̶n̶ snout up, lad

body:
I have notoriety because I've been here longer than most. Never mind the fact that the user who posted that knows me, which makes it pretty biased. Not to mention that every single user I know that is actually active is still way above me on that chart.

But as far as actually posting, look at everyone else in this guild, and other guilds, and you'll see just how badly I fall short on posting *and* discussion. I'm bad at it just like I'm bad at everything else.

But as far as actually posting, look at everyone else in this guild, and other guilds, and you'll see just how badly I fall short on posting and discussion. I'm bad at it just like I'm bad at everything else.

body: It's clear that you have terrible self esteem from constantly comparing yourself to those who are better only to demoralize yourself. You're undermining your own contributions by comparing yourself to others. Also your posts are awesome and discussion is almost always appreciated. Also maybe take this less seriously. You have a shit ton of rep and subs so you don't need to take it seriously (not thats others who don't need to either). Please stop comparing yourself to everyone as this isn't good for your mental health.

Please stop comparing yourself to everyone as this isn't good for your mental health.

body:
> It's clear that you have terrible self esteem

Of course I do. What would you expect from someone who has half succeeded at maybe 1 or 2 things ever in their life, even just hobbies, while having to watch all their friends and the whole rest of the world just casually accomplish so much? I know you're not supposed to judge yourself that way and all that, and I don't. But it's still infuriating and depressing.

> constantly comparing yourself to those who are better only to demoralize yourself

No, I'm just looking at the people I happen to know and every single one of them blows me away with ease in every aspect, because I'm not good enough at anything to even accomplish anything worthwhile. I usually hope they can tell me how they don't fail 100000% of the time, but they either don't know or don't want to tell. Everyone else just has it all together and figured out and I'm a mess who doesn't know anything.

> Also your posts are awesome and discussion is almost always appreciated.

Maybe, but it's nothing more than a handful of shit reposts and camping on specific sources all the time. Everyone else can find tons of great new stuff in an hour. As for discussion, I never have ideas for new threads and I'm always the last to know (as with everything) about the ones made by other people, at which point everyone else has already commented and it's too late for me to participate in it. This never fails.

> If you really do wanna compare though, I'd say that you're doing better than most when it comes to contributing to this site.

Yeah, because most people aren't really that interested. I can usually be better than people who've never done something before, sure. But when it comes to being good enough to actually *accomplish* anything...nope, not a chance.
body_html:
It's clear that you have terrible self esteem

Of course I do. What would you expect from someone who has half succeeded at maybe 1 or 2 things ever in their life, even just hobbies, while having to watch all their friends and the whole rest of the world just casually accomplish so much? I know you're not supposed to judge yourself that way and all that, and I don't. But it's still infuriating and depressing.

constantly comparing yourself to those who are better only to demoralize yourself

No, I'm just looking at the people I happen to know and every single one of them blows me away with ease in every aspect, because I'm not good enough at anything to even accomplish anything worthwhile. I usually hope they can tell me how they don't fail 100000% of the time, but they either don't know or don't want to tell. Everyone else just has it all together and figured out and I'm a mess who doesn't know anything.

Also your posts are awesome and discussion is almost always appreciated.

Maybe, but it's nothing more than a handful of shit reposts and camping on specific sources all the time. Everyone else can find tons of great new stuff in an hour. As for discussion, I never have ideas for new threads and I'm always the last to know (as with everything) about the ones made by other people, at which point everyone else has already commented and it's too late for me to participate in it. This never fails.

If you really do wanna compare though, I'd say that you're doing better than most when it comes to contributing to this site.

Yeah, because most people aren't really that interested. I can usually be better than people who've never done something before, sure. But when it comes to being good enough to actually accomplish anything...nope, not a chance.
